titles.title: Let Him Breathe On Me, Let Him Breathe On Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let him breathe on me, let Him breathe on me.
Let the breath of God now breathe on me.
Let Him breathe on me, let Him breathe on me.
Let the breath of God now breathe on me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
/Que respire en mi/ (2)
Que tu aliento oh Dios
Respire en mi/
